mainHero.title: Learn Japanese
mainHero.subtitle: and Never Forget it
mainHero.description: Learn everything you need to know about Japanese as efficiently as possible. We have the tools to help you gain mastery as fast as possible. Everything we wish we had when we were trying to learn Japanese, we give to you.

items.title: Optimized for efficient language acquisition
items.description: Everything you learn builds upon each other. The courses were designed so that you everything is easily understood because the foundations were already built in the previous levels.

items.title: All the tools you need to succeed
items.description: We have developed tools and resources to get you over all the hurdles of Japanese we all had to struggle through. This is a site for learners, made by learners. Everything we struggled with in Japanese we've came up with a solution for you to be able to get over those hurdles as easy as possible.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: Everything you need to learn Japanese!
features.description: With our tool, you can learn 7000 words and all the grammar you need in a year. We'll provide everything you need to get over any hurdles

items.name: Efficient Learning
items.description: Scientifically proven methods to ensure that concepts you learn stay in your long term memory

items.name: Graded Readers
items.description: At anytime have access to multitudes of resources to read suited perfectly for your level with in depth explanations in all of them.

items.name: Listening
items.description: Be able to work on your listening skills at anytime. Take quizzes to see how well you understood it.

items.name: Speaking
items.description: Resources to help you practice your pronunciation with native audio and speaking skills
